original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ste; de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ste; de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
translated: Abiding in them, sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage attain the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i @343b 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i @343b 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur gyi /
translated: the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, and arhatship, and they attain individual enlightenment.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: They do not attain unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor / de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing /🔽kun chub par bya bar sems pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing / kun chub par bya bar sems pa ste /
translated: Su­bhūti, those who, in the sūtras connected with the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, intend to reject the transcendent perfection of wisdom🔽and to reject the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'o //
translated: will not attain the gnosis of omniscience.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin las byung ba ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin las byung ba ni /
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings who have come forth from the perfection of wisdom

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: will come forth with mundane and supramundane dharmas.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings who train in the perfection of wisdom train in mundane and supramundane dharmas.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / khyi la la zhig rje bo'i zan nar ma bor te /
analyzed: dper na / khyi la la zhig rje bo'i zan nar ma bor te /
translated: for example, some dog will abandon the food its master regularly gives it

original: las mi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du /
analyzed: las mi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du /
translated: and think about looking for food from a servant.

original: rab 'byor / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te /
translated: Similarly, Subhūti, in the future there will be sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who will abandon this perfection of wisdom, the root of all buddhadharmas, which is deep,

original: yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la @344a *//🔽brten par sems pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la @344a *// brten par sems pa 'byung ste /
translated: and the sutras that are like branches, leaves, and petals, which are for śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should know that this too is the work of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor nas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, in the future there will be sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas who, having abandoned this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: khe dang bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde rnams kun chub par bya bar sems pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: khe dang bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde rnams kun chub par bya bar sems pa 'byung ste /
translated: will think to master the sutras connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas for the sake of profit and honor.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should know that this too is the work of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / mi la la zhig glang po 'dod la /
analyzed: dper na / mi la la zhig glang po 'dod la /
translated: Suppose a man wanted an elephant.

original: des glang po rnyed kyang /
analyzed: des glang po rnyed kyang /
translated: Even if he finds the elephant,

original: glang po'i rjes btsal bar sems pa yod na; rab 'byor /
analyzed: glang po'i rjes btsal bar sems pa yod na; rab 'byor /
translated: he will think that he should search for the elephant’s footprints.

original: de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Su­bhūti, what do you think of it?

original: skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
analyzed: skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
translated: Is that person endowed with sagacity?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” He replied, “Blessed One,

original: de ni ma lags so //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de ni ma lags so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: he is not.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du /
translated: ” The Blessed One said, “Su­bhūti, in the same way,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing mdo sde gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag btsal bar sems pa dag kyang dpe de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing mdo sde gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag btsal bar sems pa dag kyang dpe de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste /
translated: you should know that those individuals who follow the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, who abandon this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom, and who think that they should search for those sūtras that are associated with the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, are similar to that example.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su @344b rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su @344b rig par bya'o //
translated: Su­bhūti, this also should be known by great bodhisattva beings as the deeds of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Su­bhūti, it is as follows:

original: dper na / mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po blta bar 'dod la /
analyzed: dper na / mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po blta bar 'dod la /
translated: For example, a person who wishes to see the ocean

original: ba lang gi rjes btsal bar sems shing /
analyzed: ba lang gi rjes btsal bar sems shing /
translated: will think that he should search for the footprints of a cow.

original: des ba lang gi rmig rjes mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du /🔽rgya mtsho chen po'i tshad 'di dang mnyam mam /
analyzed: des ba lang gi rmig rjes mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du / rgya mtsho chen po'i tshad 'di dang mnyam mam /
translated: Having seen the hoofprint of an ox, he thinks,

original: mi mnyam snyam na /
analyzed: mi mnyam snyam na /
translated: ‘Is the size of the great ocean the same as this, or is it not the same?’

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think of this?

original: skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
analyzed: skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
translated: Is that person of an intelligent disposition?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: no, he is not.

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Sugata,

original: de ni ma lags so //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de ni ma lags so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: no, he is not.”

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti, in the same way, those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas who hear this deep perfection of wisdom and find it,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te /
translated: but who abandon and reject this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste /
translated: and to take up and master the sūtras associated with the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, they should know that they are like that.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should know that this too is the work of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / phyva mkhan nam phyva mkhan gyi slob ma rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du khang pa zhig dbub cing bslang bar 'dod de /🔽nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang yongs su btsal bar sems shing /
analyzed: dper na / phyva mkhan nam phyva mkhan gyi slob ma rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du khang pa zhig dbub cing bslang bar 'dod de / nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang yongs su btsal bar sems shing /
translated: for example, a mason or a mason’s apprentice who wants to build and raise a house the size of Vaijayanta,🔽who thinks to measure the palaces of the sun and moon,

original: nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang las tshad blang bar sems @345a *//🔽na; rab 'byor /
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang las tshad blang bar sems @345a *// na; rab 'byor /
translated: and who thinks to take the measure of the palaces of the sun and moon

original: de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang dpe tshul bzung ste /
analyzed: skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang dpe tshul bzung ste /
translated: Does that person take the measure and the example of the size of the palace of Vaijayanta

original: de dang 'dra ba'i khang pa dbub par nus sam /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i khang pa dbub par nus sam /
translated: “Can you destroy a house like that?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Bhagavān,

original: de ni ma lags so //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de ni ma lags so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: I cannot.”

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: The Bhagavān said, “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: phyva mkhan nam phyva mkhan gyi slob ma de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
analyzed: phyva mkhan nam phyva mkhan gyi slob ma de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
translated: Is that physician or physician’s apprentice wise?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Bhagavān,

original: skyes bu de ni byis pa'i ngang tshul can du rig par bgyi ste /
analyzed: skyes bu de ni byis pa'i ngang tshul can du rig par bgyi ste /
translated: that man should be known to be foolish,

original: mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: not wise.”

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
translated: The Bhagavān said, “Subhūti, in that same way, in the future

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /
translated: there will be some sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas who, having heard and obtained this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te /
translated: will reject and abandon this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: nyan thos dang; rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa byung na /
analyzed: nyan thos dang; rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa byung na /
translated: If the thought occurs to them to seek out the knowledge of all aspects in the sūtras of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rab 'byor / de la ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
translated: Are those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle skillful?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,🔽they are not.

original: de ni ma lags @345b so; ;bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: de ni ma lags @345b so; ;bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Sugata,

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: they are not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should know that this too is the work of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / skyes bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la /
analyzed: dper na / skyes bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la /
translated: Suppose some person wanted to see a wheel-turning emperor.

original: des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po kha dog dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba zhig yod ces /
analyzed: des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po kha dog dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba zhig yod ces /
translated: He sees the minor kings of the provinces and thinks, ‘What is the color and shape of a universal monarch like?’

original: des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang / dbyibs kyi mtshan ma gzung bar bsams te /
analyzed: des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang / dbyibs kyi mtshan ma gzung bar bsams te /
translated: He thinks, ‘I will remember the color and shape of the minor kings of the provinces,’

original: 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma'ang sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra ba zhig yod grang zhes zer na /
analyzed: 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma'ang sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra ba zhig yod grang zhes zer na /
translated: and says, ‘The color, shape, manner, and marks of that universal monarch are like this, the lord of the land.’

original: rab 'byor; de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor; de ji snyam du sems /
translated: What do you think, Subhūti,

original: skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
analyzed: skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
translated: is that person wise?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: no, he is not.

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Sugata,

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: he is not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, in the future

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te /🔽nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde @346a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde @346a *//
translated: “Subhūti, if some sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle hear this deep perfection of wisdom and, having heard it, reject and cast it aside,

original: dag las / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na /
analyzed: dag las / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na /
translated: and think they will search for the knowledge of all aspects in the sūtras connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think, Subhūti?

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Are those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle of a wise disposition?”

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: He replied, “Lord, they are not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should know that this too is the work of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / skyes bu shin tu bkres pa la la zhig gis /
analyzed: dper na / skyes bu shin tu bkres pa la la zhig gis /
translated: For example, suppose a certain person who is very hungry

analyzed: ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas rnyed kyang /
translated: finds food that has a hundred flavors,

original: drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal par sems shing /
analyzed: drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal par sems shing /

original: des kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de bor nas /
analyzed: des kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de bor nas /
translated: and having discarded that food with a hundred flavors,

original: drug cu pa'i kha zas la bza' bar bsams na /
analyzed: drug cu pa'i kha zas la bza' bar bsams na /
translated: thinks of eating food with sixty flavors.

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think of this?

original: skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
analyzed: skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
translated: Is that person of the nature of a wise person?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: he is not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, in the future

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /
translated: those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, having heard and found this deep perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di por zhing spangs te /
translated: will discard and reject this deep perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang @346b sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las /
translated: in the sūtras of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa byung na /
translated: and think to seek out omniscience,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think, Subhūti?

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
translated: Are those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle wise?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Bhagavān,

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: they are not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said,

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva mahāsattvas should know that this is also the work of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / skyes bu la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa rnyed nas /
analyzed: dper na / skyes bu la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa rnyed nas /

original: nor bu mching bu dang bsgrun par bsams na /
analyzed: nor bu mching bu dang bsgrun par bsams na /
translated: and then thinks to compare it to glass.

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think,

original: skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
analyzed: skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
translated: is that person wise?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: no it would not.

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Well-Gone One,

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: no it would not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, in the future

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /
translated: there will be some sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas who, having heard and obtained this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te /🔽nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las /
translated: will cast aside and reject this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa @347a *//
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa @347a *//
translated: and will instead seek omniscience in the sūtras that are associated with the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'byung ste / rab 'byor /
analyzed: 'byung ste / rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think?

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam /
translated: Are those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas wise in their approach?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,🔽no they are not.

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: “No, Blessed One, it would not.”

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: “Sugata, it would not.”

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: “Blessed One, it would not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti,

original: de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: bodhisattva great beings should also know that to be the work of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe /🔽spobs pa mang po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i dkrugs mar 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba 'di ltar /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe / spobs pa mang po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i dkrugs mar 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba 'di ltar /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family are writing out this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs kyi spobs pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang; brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi spobs pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs kyi spobs pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang; brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi spobs pa dang /
translated: they will be distracted by the many kinds of eloquence that will arise, such as eloquence about form, eloquence about sound, eloquence about smell, eloquence about taste, eloquence about feeling, eloquence about dharmas, eloquence about generosity, eloquence about morality, eloquence about patience, eloquence about perseverance, eloquence about concentration, and eloquence about wisdom.

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i spobs pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i spobs pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /
translated: eloquence about the desire realm, eloquence about the form realm, eloquence about the formless realm, eloquence about the scriptures, eloquence about recitation, eloquence about service, eloquence about the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag @347b par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: yang dag @347b par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: eloquence about the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the path, eloquence about the meditative stabilizations, liberations, samādhis,🔽and samāpattis, eloquence about inner emptiness, up to eloquence about the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, eloquence about the perfection of generosity, the perfection of discipline,

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: and the perfection of patience,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
translated: the eloquence of the powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the eloquence of the distinct attributes of a buddha, and up to the eloquence of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spobs pa med pas rnam par byang ba'o //🔽rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spobs pa med pas rnam par byang ba'o // rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: If you ask why,🔽Su­bhūti, it is because the transcendent perfection of wisdom is purified by the absence of eloquence.🔽Su­bhūti, the transcendent perfection of wisdom is inconceivable.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems med pa'o //
translated: Su­bhūti, the transcendent perfection of wisdom is without mind.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is unborn and unceasing.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is uncontaminated and unpurified.

original: @348a *// rab 'byor /
analyzed: @348a *// rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is unagitated.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brjod du med pa'o //🔽rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brjod du med pa'o // rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba med pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is inexpressible.🔽Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is unpurified.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is nonapprehensible.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la med cing mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la med cing mi dmigs te /
translated: Subhūti, those phenomena do not exist in this profound perfection of wisdom and are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, if, when those sons or daughters of good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle are writing out this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na /
analyzed: chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na /
translated: they are disturbed by those dharmas,

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that those sons of good family or daughters of good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle have a deed of Māra.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, venerable Subhūti said to him,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus lags sam /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus lags sam /
translated: can the perfection of wisdom be written?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta ma yin no //
translated: “No, Subhūti, it cannot.”

original: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: “Subhūti, why is that? The intrinsic nature of the perfection of wisdom does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod @348b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod @348b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of tolerance, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of generosity are not entities and are not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: all the emptinesses, and the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are not entities and are not apprehended.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: superknowledges do not exist and are not apprehended.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The meditative stabilizations and dhāraṇī gateways do not exist and are not apprehended.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha do not exist and are not apprehended.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: Up to the knowledge of all aspects does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: That nonapprehension of an intrinsic nature is a nonentity.

original: dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: That nonentity is the perfection of wisdom.

original: dngos po med pas dngos po med pa bri bar mi nus so //
analyzed: dngos po med pas dngos po med pa bri bar mi nus so //
translated: A nonentity cannot diminish a nonentity.

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang @349a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang @349a *//
translated: Subhūti, if bodhisattvas🔽

original: chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dngos po med ces bya bar 'du shes na /
analyzed: chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dngos po med ces bya bar 'du shes na /
translated: Subhūti, if sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas perceive this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom as a non-entity,

original: de'ang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: de'ang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: they should also recognize that as the activity of Māra.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris nas /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “Lord, if sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas write out this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchi na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchi na /
translated: and then say, ‘I have written out this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom,’

original: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yi ger mngon par chags pa lags te /
analyzed: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yi ger mngon par chags pa lags te /
translated: they will be fixated on the letters of this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Lord,🔽the transcendent perfection of wisdom is without letters.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is without letters.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is without syllables.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is without syllables.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is without syllables.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is without syllables.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Śāriputra said, “Blessed One,

original: gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: form is without syllables.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are without syllables.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The sense fields, elements, and dependent origination are without syllables.

original: nang stong @349b pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong @349b pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Inner emptiness is without syllables.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is without syllables.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are without syllables.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang; mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang; mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness, and the clairvoyances are without syllables.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The meditative stabilizations and dhāraṇī gateways are without syllables.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are without syllables.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Up to omniscience is without syllables.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la /
translated: “If sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle become attached to the perfection of wisdom that is without syllables,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin @350a *//
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin @350a *//
translated: they become attached to the perfection of concentration that is without syllables, the perfection of perseverance that is without syllables, the perfection of patience that is without syllables, the perfection of morality that is without syllables, and the perfection of giving that is without syllables,

original: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: they become attached to inner emptiness that is without syllables, up to they become attached to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature that is without syllables,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
translated: They become attached to the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment that are not letters,🔽the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, and the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: and the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags par bgyid na /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags par bgyid na /
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects that is without syllables,

original: de'ang byang chub @350b sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de'ang byang chub @350b sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi'o //
translated: then, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should know that this is the work of Māra.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin te /
translated: “Subhūti, it is so,

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: it is just as you have said.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle write out, recite, ask questions about, take up, read,

original: kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa'i tshe yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po skyed na /
analyzed: kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa'i tshe yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po skyed na /
translated: master, properly pay attention to, and meditate on this deep perfection of wisdom, at that time they will produce many thoughts about objects.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o ////🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should know that this too is the work of Māra.

original: bam po bzhi bcu bzhi pa; rab 'byor /
analyzed: bam po bzhi bcu bzhi pa; rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton bya ba dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton bya ba dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
translated: recites it, asks questions about it, bears it in mind, reads it aloud,

original: kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa'i tshe grong gi yid la bya ba dang / grong rdal gyi yid la bya ba dang / khams kyi yid la bya ba dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang /
analyzed: kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa'i tshe grong gi yid la bya ba dang / grong rdal gyi yid la bya ba dang / khams kyi yid la bya ba dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang /
translated: masters it, attends to it properly in thought, and meditates on it, they should not attend to thoughts of villages, towns, cities, countries, the royal palace,

original: khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang / mkhan po'i yid la bya ba dang / pha dang ma dang / @351a *//
analyzed: khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang / mkhan po'i yid la bya ba dang / pha dang ma dang / @351a *//
translated: households, preceptors, fathers, mothers,

original: phu nu dang sring mo dang / gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / rkun po dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phyag bdar ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 'jig rten dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
analyzed: phu nu dang sring mo dang / gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / rkun po dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phyag bdar ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 'jig rten dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
translated: thoughts associated with brothers and sisters, thoughts associated with relatives, thoughts associated with friends, thoughts associated with thieves, thoughts associated with servants, thoughts associated with the world,

original: stu 'tshong ma dang ldan pa dang / bud med dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / yid la bya ba gzhan mang po skye na /
analyzed: stu 'tshong ma dang ldan pa dang / bud med dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / yid la bya ba gzhan mang po skye na /
translated: thoughts associated with prostitutes, thoughts associated with women, and many other thoughts arise,

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, when they write out, take up, read, transmit, recite, and properly pay attention to this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 'gyur ba nye bar sbyor te /
analyzed: bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 'gyur ba nye bar sbyor te /
translated: then Māra the wicked one will stir up obstacles for them.

original: de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Those should be known by the bodhisattva great beings as the work of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, when sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas write out this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: khe dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / chos gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po byung la /
analyzed: khe dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / chos gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po byung la /
translated: they may obtain much gain, honor, and praise, and they may obtain Dharma robes, alms, bedding, and medicines for the sick, and various necessities.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe /
translated: When sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas write out, recite, and properly pay attention to this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: @351b de dag gi ro myong bar byed na /
analyzed: @351b de dag gi ro myong bar byed na /
translated: they may savor it.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste /
translated: Subhūti, you should know that this, too, is the work of Māra.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe /
translated: When they write out, recite, study, or properly pay attention to this profound perfection of wisdom,

original: bar chad de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bar chad de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: these kinds of obstacles will occur.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang sgom pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang sgom pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when sons of good family and daughters of good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas write out, recite, study, properly pay attention to, and meditate on this profound perfection of wisdom,

original: bdud sdig to can dag mdo sde zab mo gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bdud sdig to can dag mdo sde zab mo gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa /
translated: evil Māra will make profound sūtras that are associated with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag nye bar bsnyen par byed de /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag nye bar bsnyen par byed de /
translated: up to the noble eightfold path, and the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos thabs mkhas pas bdud kyis bsnyen pa'i mdo sde zab mo de dag la 'dod pa mi bskyed do //
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos thabs mkhas pas bdud kyis bsnyen pa'i mdo sde zab mo de dag la 'dod pa mi bskyed do //
translated: “Subhūti, sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who are skilled in means do not develop a desire for those profound sūtras that Māra approaches.

original: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na; de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na; de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, it is because they do not bring about the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mi mkhas pa dag ni /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu @352a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mi mkhas pa dag ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu @352a *//
translated: “Subhūti, those bodhisattvas who are not skilled in means

original: phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems te /
analyzed: phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems te /
translated: will, when they hear this deep perfection of wisdom, think of abandoning it.

original: de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa'ang rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa'ang rgya cher bstan te /
translated: I have also taught extensively the skillful means of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las kyang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las kyang /
translated: And in this profound perfection of wisdom

original: thabs mkhas pa rgya cher btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa rgya cher btsal bar bya'o //
translated: you should seek extensively the skillful means.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang /

translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, if the Dharma teacher is one who recites the sūtras, the geya, the vyākaraṇa, the gāthā, the udāna, the itivṛttaka, the jātaka, the vaipulya, and the adbhutadharma,

original: shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la; chos nyan pa ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang /
analyzed: shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la; chos nyan pa ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang /
translated: and the special teachings of the extensive, the marvelous Dharma, the narratives, and the instructions and analyses, but the listener does not understand the special teachings of the sūtras, the songs, the prophecies,

original: tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par mi shes na /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par mi shes na /
translated: the verses, the statements, the circumstances, the former lives, the extensive teachings, the marvelous Dharma, the narratives, and the instructions and analyses,

original: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /

translated: then, Subhūti, this is also a cause, a condition, and a reason for not writing out, not taking up, not studying, and not actualizing this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should know that this is the work of Māra.🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, if the bodhisattva great beings who are writing out, reading aloud, clearly articulating, mastering, and properly paying attention to this deep perfection of wisdom are distracted by other dharmas,🔽then, Subhūti, this is also a cause, a condition, and a reason for not writing out, not taking up, not studying, and not actualizing this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i chos kyi bar gyi khyad @355b par shes la /

analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dvags kyi yul gyi mi snyan pa brjod cing / sems can dmyal ba ni 'di lta bur sdug bsngal lo // byol song gi skye gnas ni 'di lta bur sdug bsngal lo //
translated: saying,🔽‘The hells are like this in terms of suffering.🔽The animal world is like this in terms of suffering.

original: yi dvags kyi yul ni 'di lta bur sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: yi dvags kyi yul ni 'di lta bur sdug bsngal lo //
translated: The world of ghosts is like this in terms of suffering.

original: khyod kyi sdug bsngal 'di nyid du mthar phyin par gyis @357b shig ;gang la sdug bsngal stong phrag mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya /
analyzed: khyod kyi sdug bsngal 'di nyid du mthar phyin par gyis @357b shig ;gang la sdug bsngal stong phrag mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya /
translated: “You should put an end to your suffering right here and now! What do you need with unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, which will make you experience many thousands of sufferings?

original: khyod yun ring pos 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur ta re zhes zer na /
analyzed: khyod yun ring pos 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur ta re zhes zer na /
translated: You will wander for a long time in cyclic existence!”

original: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, that also is a condition that prevents this deep perfection of wisdom from being written out, taken up, borne in mind, recited, taught, or mastered.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should know that also to be the work of Māra.🔽“

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, when this profound perfection of wisdom is being written out, read aloud, taken up, recited from memory, explained, and properly paid attention to,

original: la la zhig der 'ongs te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod /
analyzed: la la zhig der 'ongs te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod /
translated: someone may come there and proclaim the excellence of the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod /
translated: proclaim the excellence of the gods of the Trayas­triṃśa, Yāmā, Tuṣita, Nirmāṇa­rata, and Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin realms,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod cing /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod cing /
translated: and proclaim the excellence of the gods up to the Naiva­saṃjñā­nāsaṃjñāyatana realm,

original: 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pas 'di ltar bde'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pas 'di ltar bde'o //
translated: saying, ‘The desire realm is happy because of the enjoyment of desires.

original: gzugs kyi khams ni bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams ni bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde'o //
translated: The form realm is happy because of the meditative concentrations and meditative attainments.’

original: gzugs med pa'i khams ni snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams ni snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde ste /
translated: The formless realm is blissful through the meditative absorptions.

original: de dag kyang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal la bdag med do //
analyzed: de dag kyang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal la bdag med do //
translated: But those are impermanent, suffering, and without self.

original: rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can /🔽zad pa'i chos can /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can / zad pa'i chos can /
translated: They are subject to change,🔽subject to cessation,

original: 'jig @358a *// pa'i chos can /
analyzed: 'jig @358a *// pa'i chos can /
translated: subject to destruction,

original: skye ba'i chos can /
analyzed: skye ba'i chos can /
translated: subject to being born,

original: 'gag pa'i chos can yin gyi /
analyzed: 'gag pa'i chos can yin gyi /
translated: and subject to ceasing.

original: khyod kyis 'di nyid du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig /
analyzed: khyod kyis 'di nyid du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig /
translated: You should attain the fruit of entering the stream right here and now.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig /
translated: You should attain the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, and arhatship right here and now.

original: 'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis shig /
analyzed: 'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis shig /
translated: You should attain individual enlightenment right here and now.

original: phyin chad 'khor ba na mi 'khor bar gyis shig ces zer na /
analyzed: phyin chad 'khor ba na mi 'khor bar gyis shig ces zer na /
translated: You should not wander in saṃsāra from now on.”

original: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha rton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha rton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, that is also not the cause, condition, or contributory factor for writing out, explaining, or reciting this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, this also should be known by the bodhisattva mahāsattvas as the work of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the dharma teacher is alone,

original: zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la /
analyzed: zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la /
translated: without a companion, and self-sufficient,

original: chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na /
analyzed: chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na /
translated: while the dharma student is in the midst of an assembly.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, this also is a condition that does not accompany this profound perfection of wisdom when it is being written out, when it is being orally received, and when it is being recited.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, this also should be known by the bodhisattva mahāsattvas as the work of Māra.

analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / @358b kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'di skad du su'ang phyi bzhin du 'brang ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir sbyin no zhes zer la /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //

analyzed: @359a *// rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni /
translated: Subhūti,

analyzed: chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'dod la /

original: chos smra ba ni drung du 'gro ba'i skabs mi 'byed na /
analyzed: chos smra ba ni drung du 'gro ba'i skabs mi 'byed na /
translated: but the Dharma teacher does not make time to go into his presence,

original: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, that also is not having the causes and conditions for writing out, receiving the transmission of, and reciting this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos smra ba ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o // rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos smra ba ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir /
translated: Subhūti, that also should be known by the bodhisattva great beings as the work of Māra.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par 'dod /
